name: Banality
description: Banality is the measure of a lack of individuality. It is a negative trait, indicating how static the individual is.

name: Glamour
description: Glamour is the measure of a changeling's magical power. It is a positive trait, indicating how powerful the changeling is.

name: Nightmare
description: Inhuman madness. Nightmare is a negative trait, indicating how much the changeling is affected by the nightmare.
